document_data.mainbody:
aelyn the Dove was a half-celestial cleric of Ilmater. She fought alongside the Kalach-Cha during their adventures in the Unapproachable East in the .
If she stood on the dais in the mirror puzzle at the Academy of Shapers and Binders, the mirror form of her that appeared at the other end had the wings of an erinyes.
